trans-unit.source: Redirect URL: If index.php was modified, you can redirect to another page. But please define a page on another server or domain to prevent endless redirect loops.
Render Text: If you haven't configured a redirect URL, you can enter a fixed text here, which will be used for output.
Email to: Email address for notifications (separate multiple addresses with comma)
Email from: If we send emails, from whose email address we should send them? We prefer to insert addresses from your domain. Else they may be declared as spam.
Waiting time between e-mail: set the waiting time (in seconds) between the notification e-mails.
Template for hacking: Define an email template path, which should be used to send the hacking notice.
Template for not readable: Define an email template path, which should be used to send a notification, if index.php is not readable.
Template for redirect: Define a template for redirecting to another location via META refresh.
Template for alternative output: Define a template, which should be shown, if an index.php modification was detected.
